verses.verse: <S%G33>Go<s%> to <S%G3568>now,<s%> you <S%G4145>rich<s%> men, <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3649>howl<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5004>miseries<s%> that shall <S%G1904>come<s%> on you.
<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> are <S%G4595>corrupted,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> are <S%G4598>moth-eaten.<s%>

<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%> and <S%G696>silver<s%> is <S%G2728>corroded;<s%> and the <S%G2447>rust<s%> of them shall be a <S%G3142>witness<s%> against you, and shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> as it were <S%G4442>fire.<s%> You <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2343>heaped<s%> <S%G2343>treasure<s%> together for the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G3408>hire<s%> of the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G270>reaped<s%> down <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5561>fields,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is of you <S%G650>kept<s%> <S%G650>back<s%> by <S%G650>fraud,<s%> <S%G2896>cries:<s%> and the <S%G995>cries<s%> of them which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2325>reaped<s%> are <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>sabaoth.<s%>

You have <S%G5171>lived<s%> in <S%G5171>pleasure<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and been <S%G4684>wanton;<s%> you have <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> as in a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4967>slaughter.<s%>
You have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> and <S%G5407>killed<s%> the <S%G1342>just;<s%> and he does not <S%G498>resist<s%> you.

Be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> to the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G1092>farmer<s%> <S%G1551>waits<s%> for the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and has <S%G3114>long<s%> <S%G3114>patience<s%> for it, <S%G2193>until<s%> he <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4406>early<s%> and <S%G3797>latter<s%> <S%G5205>rain.<s%>
Be you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3114>patient;<s%> <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> for the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> draws <S%G1448>near.<s%>

<S%G4727>Grudge<s%> not <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be <S%G2632>condemned:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2923>judge<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

<S%G2983>Take,<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for an <S%G5262>example<s%> of <S%G2552>suffering<s%> <S%G2552>affliction,<s%> and of <S%G3115>patience.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G3106>count<s%> them <S%G3106>happy<s%> which <S%G5278>endure.<s%> You have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2492>Job,<s%> and have <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G4184>very<s%> <S%G4184>pitiful,<s%> and of <S%G3629>tender<s%> <S%G3629>mercy.<s%>

But <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> not, <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3727>oath:<s%> but let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3483>yes<s%> be <S%G3483>yes;<s%> and <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3756>no,<s%> <S%G3756>no;<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G5259>into<s%> <S%G5272>condemnation.<s%>
Is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G2553>afflicted?<s%> let him <S%G4336>pray.<s%> Is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2114>merry?<s%> let him <S%G5567>sing<s%> <S%G5567>psalms.<s%>

Is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you? let him <S%G4341>call<s%> for the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church;<s%> and let them <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> him, <S%G218>anointing<s%> him with <S%G1637>oil<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>

And the <S%G2171>prayer<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> the <S%G2577>sick,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G1453>raise<s%> him up; and if he have <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> they shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him.

<S%G1843>Confess<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3900>faults<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> for <S%G240>another,<s%> that you may be <S%G2390>healed.<s%> The <S%G1754>effectual<s%> fervent <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> man <S%G2480>avails<s%> <S%G4183>much.<s%>

<S%G2243>Elias<s%> was a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3663>subject<s%> to <S%G3663>like<s%> <S%G3663>passions<s%> as we are, and he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4335>earnestly<s%> that it might not <S%G1026>rain:<s%> and it <S%G1026>rained<s%> not <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> by the space of <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1763>years<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G5205>rain,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G985>brought<s%> <S%G985>forth<s%> her <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>
<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> of you do <S%G4105>err<s%> from the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1994>convert<s%> him;

Let him <S%G1097>know,<s%> that he which <S%G1994>converts<s%> the <S%G268>sinner<s%> from the <S%G4106>error<s%> of his <S%G3598>way<s%> shall <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>soul<s%> from <S%G2288>death,<s%> and shall <S%G2572>hide<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
